page.title: 05Local News
page.content: Local News The local paper in Coatbridge is the {Advertiser.}In the office there is a Chief Editor,some printers,two junior people,two photographers,one deputy and five advertiser staff.If you want to be involved in the Advertiser you must dress to suit the occassion because you go round places like the fire station,shopping centre and cover the miners strike.We interviewed one of the reporters. He said he met eight {Miss Advertisers.}He has been a reporter for 7 years and likes meeting interesting people. In the factory 25_30 thousand copies a week are printed.The main story this week was about{asbestos}being dumped nearby Coatbridge.
